mapper.insert: insert into JH_Auth_Function (ID, MODEL_ID, PAGE_NAME, PAGE_URL, ACTION_DATA, IS_INIT, REMARK, FUN_ORDER, PAGE_CODE, EX_DATA, COM_ID, DEL_FLG, UP_USER, UP_DATE, CR_USER, CR_DATE) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{modelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{actionData,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isInit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{funOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pageCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{exData,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{delFlg,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{upUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{upDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{crUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update JH_Auth_Function set MODEL_ID = #{modelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PAGE_NAME = #{pageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAGE_URL = #{pageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACTION_DATA = #{actionData,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_INIT = #{isInit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FUN_ORDER = #{funOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PAGE_CODE = #{pageCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EX_DATA = #{exData,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COM_ID = #{comId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DEL_FLG = #{delFlg,jdbcType=CHAR}, UP_USER = #{upUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UP_DATE = #{upDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CR_USER = #{crUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CR_DATE = #{crDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select ID, MODEL_ID, PAGE_NAME, PAGE_URL, ACTION_DATA, IS_INIT, REMARK, FUN_ORDER, PAGE_CODE, EX_DATA, COM_ID, DEL_FLG, UP_USER, UP_DATE, CR_USER, CR_DATE from JH_Auth_Function where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
